mapper.sql: id, code, parentid, name, icon, url, num, levels, tips
mapper.select: SELECT code, parentid, name, icon, url, num, levels, tips FROM role_menu_relation RIGHT JOIN menu ON role_menu_relation.menuid = menu.id WHERE roleid = #{roleid}
mapper.insert: insert into menu (id, code, parentid, name, icon, url, num, levels, tips) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{levels,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tips,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into menu
id,
code,
parentid,

icon,
url,
num,
levels,
tips,

mapper.update:
update menu
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
levels = #{levels,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tips = #{tips,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
